# insertDebugSignpost(_:)

**Instance Method**

Inserts a debug string into the captured frame data.

## Declaration

```swift
func insertDebugSignpost(_ string: String)
```

## Discussion

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Xcode/Naming-resources-and-commands].

## Annotating the command buffer with debug information

- **pushDebugGroup(_:)**: Pushes a specific string onto a stack of debug group strings for the command encoder.
- **popDebugGroup()**: Pops the latest string off of a stack of debug group strings for the command encoder.
